description: Square array T(n,k) (n >= 2, k >= 1) giving smallest positive integer m such that any set of m points in general position in R^n contains k points in convex position, read by antidiagonals.
links: W. Morris and V. Soltan, The Erdos-Szekeres problem on points in convex position - a survey, Bull. Amer. Math. Soc., 37 (No. 4, 2000), 437-458.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Mar 19 2001
